programme.title: The Night Watchmen
programme.desc: Premiere. Three useless night watchmen, assisted by a young rookie and a tabloid journalist, fight for their lives against a horde of hungry vampires. Comedy horror, starring Ken Arnold, Dan DeLuca and Kevin Jiggetts.

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: A gay couple plan for a weekend of mischief, winding up the Christian owner of a remote Christian B&B. Events take a sinister turn when another guest arrives, who they think might have something more deadly in mind. Thriller, starring Tom Bateman, Sean Teale and Paul McGann.

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: Premiere. Biopic of Thurgood Marshall, the crusading lawyer who would become the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases. Starring Chadwick Boseman and Josh Gad.

programme.title: Anon: Special
programme.desc: A feature on the sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen.

programme.title: My Pet Dinosaur
programme.desc: Premiere. A lad called Jake accidentally makes a new friend thanks to an experiment gone wrong. With the creature evolving every day, the youngster finds it increasingly difficult to keep the new pet a secret from his neighbours. Adventure, starring Jordan Dulieu, Annabel Wolfe and Scott Irwin.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: Detective Harry Hole investigates the disappearance of a woman whose scarf is found wrapped around an ominous-looking snowman. Crime drama based on the Jo Nesbo novel, starring Michael Fassbender, Rebecca Ferguson and Charlotte Gainsbourg.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: Five medical students embark on a daring experiment. By stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near-death experience, giving them a first hand account of the afterlife. Sci-fi drama based on the 1990 thriller, starring Ellen Page, Diego Luna and Nina Dobrev.

programme.title: Call Me by Your Name
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Elio begins a relationship with Oliver, his father's research assistant in northern Italy. Oscar and Bafta-winning romantic drama, starring Armie Hammer, Timothee Chalamet and Michael Stuhlbarg.

programme.title: Victoria & Abdul
programme.desc: Premiere. Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim. Stephen Frears drama, starring Judi Dench, Ali Fazal and Tim Pigott-Smith.

programme.title: Alien Invasion: S.U.M.1
programme.desc: After aggressive aliens take over the Earth, human survivors are forced to live in giant underground bunkers. A young military rookie is sent to the surface to save a group of unprotected survivors. Sci-fi thriller, starring Iwan Rheon, Andre Hennicke and Rainer Werner.(n)

programme.title: Call Me by Your Name
programme.desc: Premiere. Seventeen-year-old Elio begins a relationship with Oliver, his father's research assistant in northern Italy. Oscar and Bafta-winning romantic drama, starring Armie Hammer, Timothee Chalamet and Michael Stuhlbarg.(n)

programme.title: American Honey
programme.desc: A poor teenager leaves home and hits the road with a crew of magazine sellers. She gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love while crossing the Midwest United States. Drama, starring Sasha Lane, Shia LaBeouf and Riley Keough.

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: A Navy recruit undergoing officer training has an uneasy romance with a factory worker. He also attracts the attention of a tough, uncompromising sergeant, who sees his potential and is determined to push him to the limit. Romantic drama, starring Richard Gere, Debra Winger, Louis Gossett Jr, Robert Loggia, David Keith and David Caruso.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: A naval nurse falls in love with a French plantation owner on an American-held island during the Second World War. However, dark secrets surface from his past and result in her having to leave the colony and embark on a perilous mission with the help of a US Navy officer. Romantic musical based on the Rodgers and Hammerstein Broadway show, with Mitzi Gaynor, Rossano Brazzi, John Kerr and Ray Walston.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A Marine serving in Iraq finds a photograph of a woman belonging to an unknown fellow soldier, and considers it his good luck charm. When he returns to America, he decides to track her down, and after taking a job at her family's boarding kennels, falls in love with her. Romantic drama, with Zac Efron, Taylor Schilling and Blythe Danner.

programme.title: A Street Cat Named Bob
programme.desc: Homeless busker James Bowen has a life-changing moment when a tabby cat walks into his life. Comedy-drama based on the best selling novel, starring Luke Treadaway, Ruta Gedmintas and Anthony Head.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: Having sworn revenge against his relative's widow, a young Englishman finds his plans soon change after they finally meet. Drama based on the Daphne Du Maurier novel, starring Rachel Weisz, Sam Claflin and Holliday Grainger.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A Marine serving in Iraq finds a photograph of a woman belonging to an unknown fellow soldier, and considers it his good luck charm. When he returns to America, he decides to track her down, and after taking a job at her family's boarding kennels, falls in love with her. Romantic drama, with Zac Efron, Taylor Schilling and Blythe Danner.

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: A reclusive genius creates a boy but dies before completing him, leaving his brainchild with scissor-like blades in place of hands. A kindly woman from a nearby suburb takes pity on the lonely figure and welcomes him into her home. He quickly becomes a hit in the neighbourhood - but then his new friends start to turn against him. Tim Burton's fantasy, starring Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Dianne Wiest and Vincent Price.

programme.title: The Birth of a Nation
programme.desc: Biopic of Nat Turner, the literate plantation preacher who led a slave rebellion in 1831 Virginia, starring Nate Parker, Armie Hammer and Penelope Ann Miller.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: Having sworn revenge against his relative's widow, a young Englishman finds his plans soon change after they finally meet. Drama based on the Daphne Du Maurier novel, starring Rachel Weisz, Sam Claflin and Holliday Grainger.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: The bookish Anastasia Steele and damaged billionaire playboy Christian Grey continue their sado masochistic relationship, while their safety is threatened by strangers from his past. Erotic drama sequel to Fifty Shades of Grey, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan and Rita Ora.

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Sky
programme.desc: A French woman embarks on a life-changing trip through the California desert after a dramatic blow-up with her husband. Drama, starring Diane Kruger and Norman Reedus.(n)

programme.title: Chariots of Fire
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama based on the true story of British runners Eric Liddell and Harold Abrahams, going for gold at the 1924 Olympics in Paris. The two athletes are driven by very different impulses - Liddell is inspired by his devout Christian faith, while Abrahams hopes to triumph over the anti-Semitism he has endured all his life. Starring Ian Charleson, Ben Cross, Nigel Havers, John Gielgud and Ian Holm. Vangelis provides the soundtrack.(n)

programme.title: Burn Country
programme.desc: An aspiring Afghan journalist moves to small-town California and begins investigating the disappearance of a local. Mystery drama, starring James Franco, Melissa Leo, Dominic Rains and Rachel Brosnahan.(n)

programme.title: Custody
programme.desc: Three women are brought together when a hard-working single mother has her children taken away. Courtroom drama, starring Viola Davis and Hayden Panettiere.(n)

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: The ghost of a daredevil pilot who was killed while fighting a raging forest fire is unable to rest until he helps his successor face the challenges of the job - and persuade his heartbroken girlfriend to accept her loss and move on with her life. Romantic fantasy, directed by Steven Spielberg and starring Richard Dreyfuss, Holly Hunter, John Goodman and Audrey Hepburn.(n)

programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.desc: Fact-based romantic drama based on the life of writer Karen Blixen, who, after relocating from Denmark to a farm in Nairobi for a marriage of convenience, embarked on a passionate and ill-fated love affair with an idealistic British adventurer. Starring Meryl Streep, Robert Redford, Michael Kitchen, Klaus Maria Brandauer and Leslie Phillips.(n)

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: Single man Frank Adler attempts to raise his child prodigy niece, Mary. However, his plans for a normal school life for the youngster are foiled when the youngster's mathematical abilities come to the attention of Frank's formidable mother, Evelyn. Drama, starring Chris Evans, Lindsay Duncan and Mckenna Grace.(n)

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old private is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle, as flashbacks show what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions. Drama, starring Joe Alwyn, Garrett Hedlund and Arturo Castro.(n)

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Biopic of soul singer Ray Charles, exploring his battle against racial bigotry, drug addiction and personal demons on his rise to stardom. Blind by the time he was seven, the musician flirted with several styles including gospel, jazz and country, and became known as one of the music industry's most innovative performers. Starring an Oscar-winning Jamie Foxx alongside Regina King and Kerry Washington.(n)

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: Single man Frank Adler attempts to raise his child prodigy niece, Mary. However, his plans for a normal school life for the youngster are foiled when the youngster's mathematical abilities come to the attention of Frank's formidable mother, Evelyn. Drama, starring Chris Evans, Lindsay Duncan and Mckenna Grace.(n)

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: A research doctor in a New York psychiatric hospital provokes equal measures of professional interest and suspicion when he appears to have discovered a means of reviving patients who have been trapped in a catatonic state for over 30 years. Fact-based drama, starring Robin Williams, Robert De Niro, Julie Kavner, Penelope Ann Miller, Max von Sydow and Alice Drummond.(n)

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: A hard-working construction worker is forced to deal with life-shattering loss when his family are killed in a plane crash. Drama, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Scoot McNairy and Maggie Grace.(n)

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Lounge singers Lorelei and Dorothy embark on a transatlantic cruise to Paris in search of rich husbands. While Dorothy falls for a penniless man, Lorelei thinks she has found the millionaire of her dreams, only for his father to hire a private eye to spy on her and prove she is a gold-digger. Howard Hawks' musical comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe, Jane Russell, Charles Coburn and Elliott Reid.(n)

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga.(n)

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: An over-the-hill New York City crooner hopes to make a comeback, while verbally sparring with his thirtysomething daughter. Comedy drama, starring Christopher Walken and Amber Heard.(n)

programme.title: The Way We Were
programme.desc: Upper-class novelist Hubbell Gardiner and Jewish political activist Katie Morosky meet at college in the 1930s and later marry. Although very much in love, their opposing political outlooks lead to conflict when Hubbell's successful career as a Hollywood screenwriter is compromised by his wife's socialist leanings. As the 1950s dawn it becomes clear their differences are too great to overcome. Romantic drama, with Robert Redford, Barbra Streisand, Bradford Dillman and Murray Hamilton.(n)

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: A service that provides holographic recreations of dead loved ones allows a woman to meet the younger version of her deceased husband. Sci-fi drama, starring Geena Davis, Lois Smith, Jon Hamm and Tim Robbins.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Girl Flu
programme.desc: Bird, a 12-year-old girl, endures the worst week of her life when she is ditched by her impulsive, free spirited mother. Comedy, starring Katee Sackhoff, Jade Pettyjohn and Jeremy Sisto.(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving are targeted by the authorities in 1950s Virginia, leading to an historic legal battle. Fact-based drama, starring Ruth Negga, Joel Edgerton and Will Dalton.(n)

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: A service that provides holographic recreations of dead loved ones allows a woman to meet the younger version of her deceased husband. Sci-fi drama, starring Geena Davis, Lois Smith, Jon Hamm and Tim Robbins.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: A Playboy bunny is ejected from Hugh Hefner's mansion for being considered over-the-hill on her 27th birthday, and has to find a new home and a fresh role in life. She becomes the unlikely house mother for a dowdy college sorority, and sets about giving its inmates a pin-up style makeover and turning their social lives around. Comedy, starring Anna Faris, Colin Hanks, Emma Stone and Kat Dennings.

programme.title: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: A washed-up pop idol is given the chance to write a song for a teenage star - but despite his musical talents, he has never written a lyric in his life. However, the discovery that the woman who looks after his plants has a way with words marks the start of a beautiful relationship. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Drew Barrymore, Brad Garret and Kristen Johnston.

programme.title: It Had to Be You
programme.desc: A commitment-shy jingle writer runs for the hills when her boyfriend proposes. Romantic comedy, starring Cristin Milioti, Dan Soder and Halley Feiffer.

programme.title: The Sweetest Thing
programme.desc: A woman more interested in one-night stands than true love is forced to reassess her priorities after meeting the man of her dreams. However, when she hears he is getting married, she sets out on a hectic road trip across America to stop the wedding. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Christina Applegate, Selma Blair and Thomas Jane.

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: A harassed publisher faces several unexpected set-backs on the way to his wedding - including a chance encounter with a vivacious woman, who only adds to his confusion as he begins to feel stirrings of love for her. Romantic comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Ben Affleck, Maura Tierney, Steve Zahn, Blythe Danner and Ronny Cox.

programme.title: Table 19
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Craig Robinson and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: Straight-laced suburbanite couple Scott and Kate Johansen set up an illegal casino when their daughter's scholarship falls through. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler and Jason Mantzoukas.

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick.

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A bail enforcement agent is assigned the task of tracking down his own ex-wife, a wily reporter chasing a story about a murder cover-up. However, bringing his former spouse to justice is harder than he anticipated, not least because she has also been targeted by the criminal she is investigating. Action comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Jennifer Aniston, Gio Perez, Joel Garland, Jason Kolotouros and Matt Malloy.

programme.title: Table 19
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Craig Robinson and Lisa Kudrow.

Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Christina Applegate, Selma Blair and Thomas Jane.(n)

programme.title: That's Not Me
programme.desc: Aspiring actress Polly sees her movie star dreams come crashing down after her identical twin Amy becomes an international celebrity. Comedy, starring Alice Foulcher, Isabel Lucas and Richard Davies.(n)

programme.title: Did You Hear about the Morgans
programme.desc: A bickering, separated couple on the brink of divorce are thrown back together when they witness a murder. The FBI arrange for them to go into hiding in a remote mountain town, a predicament that could either save their marriage or see them at each other's throats more than ever. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant and Sarah Jessica Parker.(n)

programme.title: Flirting With Love
programme.desc: Constant distractions hamper a pair of struggling New York actors who retreat to the country to work on a script. Comedy, starring Marisa Tomei, Sam Rockwell and Ivan Martin.(n)

programme.title: All About Steve
programme.desc: A single crossword compiler goes on a blind date with a news cameraman and is instantly smitten, but he is less keen. When her infatuation gets her fired from her job, she devotes herself to pursuing him across America, determined to convince him they are meant for each other. Romantic comedy, with Sandra Bullock, Bradley Cooper and Thomas Haden Church.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Town
programme.desc: A bad-tempered dentist has a near-death experience and finds himself able to see ghosts. He is irritated to find that all the spirits need him to sort out their unresolved problems from when they were alive, particularly a man who wants the grouchy dentist to stop his widow from remarrying. Comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Greg Kinnear and Tea Leoni.(n)

programme.title: Austin Found
programme.desc: A woman who is fed up with her boring lifestyle hatches a plot to make her family instant celebrities. However, not everything goes as planned. Comedy, starring Linda Cardellini, Skeet Ulrich and Craig Robinson.(n)

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A vet working at a Hawaiian zoo falls madly in love with a beautiful woman and pulls out all the stops to romance her. However, his attempts to woo her are seriously undermined by the fact that she suffers from short-term memory-loss, meaning he has to resume his courtship from scratch every day. Romantic comedy, starring Drew Barrymore, Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and Dan Aykroyd.(n)

programme.title: Going in Style
programme.desc: When their pension pots disappear overnight, a trio of cash-strapped retirees decide to rob a Brooklyn bank. Heist caper, starring Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine and Alan Arkin.(n)

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Two irresponsible salesmen find themselves in trouble with the law after crashing their truck. To avoid jail, they agree to undertake community service looking after a couple of troubled kids. However, it soon seems that going to prison would have been the easier option. Comedy, starring Paul Rudd, Seann William Scott and Christopher Mintz-Plasse.(n)

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan.(n)

programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Don't Think Twice
programme.desc: Turmoil strikes a New York improv troupe when one member leaves to star in a Saturday Night Live-style TV show. Comedy, starring Keegan-Michael Key and Gillian Jacobs.(n)

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his gang of daredevil friends bring the MTV series to the big screen. As usual, they perform a variety of weird and wonderful stunts, including crawling across dozens of mousetraps while wearing rodent make-up, and being rolled down bowling lanes on skateboards. Comedy, with Bam Margera, Henry Rollins, Spike Jonze and Tony Hawk.(n)

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Commandant Lassard sends the incompetent cops to Russia to help their counterparts capture an elusive criminal mastermind who uses his genius with computers to pull off a series of daring robberies. Comedy sequel, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf, Leslie Easterbrook and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: The Night is Young
programme.desc: On a booze-fuelled night out, two pairs of downtrodden friends discover that Los Angeles might not be as bad they'd always assumed. Comedy, starring Matt Jones, Dave Hill and Kelen Coleman.(n)

programme.title: Kill Me Three Times
programme.desc: A hitman arrives in an Australian surfing town on a mission. However, he soon discovers he is not the only one plotting to kill his intended target, and gets mixed up in his rivals' stories of murder, blackmail and revenge. Comedy thriller, starring Simon Pegg, Alice Braga, Luke Hemsworth and Bryan Brown.(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: A Playboy bunny is ejected from Hugh Hefner's mansion for being considered over-the-hill on her 27th birthday, and has to find a new home and a fresh role in life. She becomes the unlikely house mother for a dowdy college sorority, and sets about giving its inmates a pin-up style makeover and turning their social lives around. Comedy, starring Anna Faris, Colin Hanks, Emma Stone and Kat Dennings.(n)

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Four teenage boys make a solemn pact to lose their virginity before the high-school prom, and though their antics cause them huge embarrassment and public humiliation, the friends also learn about love and affection in their relations with the opposite sex. Coming-of-age comedy, starring Jason Biggs, Shannon Elizabeth, Chris Klein, Alyson Hannigan, Mena Suvari, Seann William Scott and Eugene Levy.(n)

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: The teenagers reunite after their first year at college to spend the summer at a lake house. Jim is concerned by his lack of sexual experience, and goes in search of an old flame, Oz struggles to keep a long-term relationship going, and Finch tries to master the art of tantric sex. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan and Eugene Levy.(n)

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller.(n)

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine.(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Joneses
programme.desc: A normal suburban couple discover their seemingly perfect neighbours are undercover spies. Action comedy, starring Zach Galifianakis, Jon Hamm and Wonder Woman's Gal Gadot.(n)

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Four teenage boys make a solemn pact to lose their virginity before the high-school prom, and though their antics cause them huge embarrassment and public humiliation, the friends also learn about love and affection in their relations with the opposite sex. Coming-of-age comedy, starring Jason Biggs, Shannon Elizabeth, Chris Klein, Alyson Hannigan, Mena Suvari, Seann William Scott and Eugene Levy.(n)

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: The teenagers reunite after their first year at college to spend the summer at a lake house. Jim is concerned by his lack of sexual experience, and goes in search of an old flame, Oz struggles to keep a long-term relationship going, and Finch tries to master the art of tantric sex. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan and Eugene Levy.(n)

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine.(n)

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The ruthless vigilante considers hanging up his guns when he learns a gangster he killed was actually an undercover FBI agent. However, he must return to his war on crime when a mobster who was hideously disfigured at his hands assembles a gang of violent criminals to cause mayhem on the streets of New York. Action thriller based on the Marvel comic-book, starring Ray Stevenson and Dominic West.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The bandana-wearing one-man army has turned his back on violence to live a quiet life in Thailand. But before long he takes up arms once again to rescue a party of missionaries who have been taken captive en route to Burma by a sadistic military officer. Action sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Julie Benz and Graham McTavish.

programme.title: Stone of Destiny
programme.desc: Four students in 1950s Glasgow hatch a plan to inspire a little national pride by breaking into Westminster Abbey and stealing the Stone of Scone, an important Scottish historical relic that has been held on English soil since the Middle Ages, and returning it to its own country. Fact-based comedy, starring Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Billy Boyd and Robert Carlyle.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A spaceship crash leaves a renowned war hero and his 13-year-old son stranded on Earth, which was abandoned by the human race centuries ago. Since mankind's departure, the planet has become home to all manner of dangerous life-forms, and the boy must make a desperate journey across hostile terrain to secure a rescue for his injured father. Sci-fi adventure, starring Will and Jaden Smith, with Sophie Okonedo.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent is accused of being a sleeper assassin with a deadly purpose - to kill the Russian president during a diplomatic visit and start a third world war. She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A reluctant, alcoholic superhero ends up the most hated man in Los Angeles thanks to his habit of causing mayhem and destruction while trying to do good. However, when he saves the life of a PR guru, the grateful executive sets about transforming the public perception of the crime-fighter, despite his wife's strong misgivings. Comedy, starring Will Smith, Jason Bateman and Charlize Theron.

programme.title: Battle for Moscow
programme.desc: A group of soldiers in the Red Army's Rifle Division battle to stop the Nazi advancement toward Moscow in 1941. Wartime drama, starring Maksim Abrosimov, Sergey Agafonov and Pavel Aseev. In Russian.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.

A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

However, when he saves the life of a PR guru, the grateful executive sets about transforming the public perception of the crime-fighter, despite his wife's strong misgivings. Comedy, starring Will Smith, Jason Bateman and Charlize Theron.(n)

She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: A Saxon nobleman is declared an outlaw for protecting a poacher from a cruel Norman knight. Hiding out in a forest, he recruits a group of bandits and leads them in a campaign against the corrupt Norman aristocracy, while also fighting to save his friend's niece from being forced into marriage. Adventure, starring Patrick Bergin and Uma Thurman.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco.(n)

programme.title: Batman: The Killing Joke
programme.desc: The Dark Knight pursues his arch-enemy the Joker, who has escaped from Arkham Asylum. The Joker is haunted by the events that made him the man he is, and decides to launch a sadistic attack on those closest to Batman, with the intent of proving a cruel point about the line between good and evil. Animated comic-book thriller based on Alan Moore and Brian Bolland's graphic novel, with the voices of Kevin Conroy and Mark Hamill.(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: Highlander
programme.desc: A 16th-century Scottish clansman discovers he is one of a race of immortal warriors who can only be killed by beheading, and who are destined to fight to the death until just one survives. Centuries later in modern-day New York, he prepares for a final showdown with his deadliest enemy. Fantasy action adventure, starring Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Clancy Brown and Roxanne Hart. Featuring a soundtrack by Queen.(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose.(n)

programme.title: Batman: The Killing Joke
programme.desc: The Dark Knight pursues his arch-enemy the Joker, who has escaped from Arkham Asylum. The Joker is haunted by the events that made him the man he is, and decides to launch a sadistic attack on those closest to Batman, with the intent of proving a cruel point about the line between good and evil. Animated comic-book thriller based on Alan Moore and Brian Bolland's graphic novel, with the voices of Kevin Conroy and Mark Hamill.(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: Highlander
programme.desc: A 16th-century Scottish clansman discovers he is one of a race of immortal warriors who can only be killed by beheading, and who are destined to fight to the death until just one survives. Centuries later in modern-day New York, he prepares for a final showdown with his deadliest enemy. Fantasy action adventure, starring Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Clancy Brown and Roxanne Hart. Featuring a soundtrack by Queen.(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose.(n)

programme.title: Marked for Death
programme.desc: A former narcotics agent decides it is time to retire and settle down after his partner is killed. However, his peaceful retirement comes to an abrupt end when a villainous drug dealer known as Screwface tries to kill his sister and her daughter. The enraged operative pursues the crime lord to Jamaica in search of vengeance. Action thriller, starring Steven Seagal, Basil Wallace and Joanna Pacula.(n)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: A world-weary former police officer encounters the Devil himself on New Year's Eve 1999, and is spurred into action to stop the Prince of Darkness exploiting an innocent woman to bring about Armageddon. Supernatural thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gabriel Byrne, Robin Tunney, Rod Steiger, Kevin Pollak, CCH Pounder and Miriam Margolyes.(n)

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Wise karate mentor Mr Miyagi meets the orphaned teenage grand-daughter of a soldier who once saved his life. As well as guiding her through the trials of high school and her first romance, he takes her to a Zen monastery to hone her martial arts skills. Adventure sequel, starring Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside and Constance Towers.(n)

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria.(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: When thugs steal Keanu the cat, two mild-mannered cousins pose as deadly assassins to get the beloved feline back. Action comedy, starring Jordan Peele, Keegan-Michael Key and Tiffany Haddish.(n)

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: The alien thunder god returns to Earth when a powerful weapon from the dawn of time is discovered. The device attracts the attention of an old enemy of his people, who intends to use it to plunge the universe into darkness - and to stop him, Thor must form an uneasy alliance with his treacherous brother Loki. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston and Natalie Portman.(n)

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Superman's home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey.(n)

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria.(n)

programme.title: Willow
programme.desc: A farmer with dreams of becoming a wizard finds an abandoned baby, who is destined to bring about the downfall of an evil queen. The wicked tyrant's minions have been sent to kill the child before she can fulfil the prophecy, and it falls to the would-be sorcerer to protect her, with the aid of a rogue warrior. Fantasy adventure, starring Warwick Davis and Val Kilmer.(n)

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: The alien thunder god returns to Earth when a powerful weapon from the dawn of time is discovered. The device attracts the attention of an old enemy of his people, who intends to use it to plunge the universe into darkness - and to stop him, Thor must form an uneasy alliance with his treacherous brother Loki. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston and Natalie Portman.(n)

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: A mysterious musician carrying a guitar case full of firearms turns up in a small backwoods town to exact revenge on the drugs baron who killed his girlfriend and permanently injured his hand. Robert Rodriguez's action thriller, starring Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Cheech Marin, Joaquim de Almeida, Steve Buscemi and Quentin Tarantino.(n)

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: A New York gang leader calls together all the gangs in the city, with the intention of uniting them. However, when he is assassinated, one of the groups he was hoping to draw into his alliance is framed for the murder, and finds all the others have turned on it. A battle for survival to make it back to their own turf alive ensues. Action adventure, starring Michael Beck and James Remar.

programme.title: Don't Look Now
programme.desc: A couple trying to get over the death of their daughter take a trip to Venice, where they are shocked by a psychic's claim that the child is trying to contact them. Although the wife believes her story, the husband remains sceptical - until he begins to be troubled by spectral visions of his own. Nicholas Roeg's supernatural thriller based on Daphne du Maurier's short story, with Donald Sutherland and Julie Christie.

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: A town marshal is torn between love and duty on his wedding day as he prepares for the arrival of a vengeful adversary on the midday train. Meanwhile, the townsfolk the marshal has so loyally protected are certain he will be killed in the confrontation and abandon him one by one to face his enemy alone. Western, starring Gary Cooper, Grace Kelly, Lloyd Bridges and Lee Van Cleef.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: Two conmen decide to swindle a mobster out of a fortune in revenge for the murder of a mutual friend. Enlisting the help of a host of crooks, they quickly conjure up a brilliant scheme to make him pay for his crime. Oscar-winning Depression-era comedy drama, starring Robert Redford, Paul Newman, Robert Shaw, Charles Durning and Eileen Brennan.

programme.title: Winchester '73
programme.desc: A gunslinger tracks down his father's killer, but is unable to exact his revenge because the sheriff of the town makes a point of confiscating all firearms. Instead he challenges him to compete in a shooting competition to win a superb rifle, but when the murderer loses, he steals the coveted prize. Western, starring James Stewart, Shelley Winters, Dan Duryea and Stephen McNally.

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: Two conmen decide to swindle a mobster out of a fortune in revenge for the murder of a mutual friend. Enlisting the help of a host of crooks, they quickly conjure up a brilliant scheme to make him pay for his crime. Oscar-winning Depression-era comedy drama, starring Robert Redford, Paul Newman, Robert Shaw, Charles Durning and Eileen Brennan.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: An obsessive surveillance expert makes the unprofessional mistake of getting personally involved in a dangerous case. Francis Ford Coppola's thriller, starring Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Robert Duvall, Allen Garfield and Harrison Ford.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: Two tough New York cops use unorthodox methods to try to break an international drug ring. When their information leads them to place a candy store under surveillance, they discover the owners are the American agents for a French kingpin planning to ship millions of dollars worth of heroin into the US. Oscar-winning fact-based thriller, starring Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey and Tony Lo Bianco.(n)

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: Hard-nosed New York narcotics cop Popeye Doyle pursues a drug dealer to his lair in Marseille. However, he soon lives to regret his decision when he is captured by the criminal and subjected to a cruel revenge by being forcibly addicted to heroin. John Frankenheimer's thriller sequel, starring Gene Hackman, Fernando Rey, Bernard Fresson, Jean-Pierre Castaldi and Charles Millot.(n)

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: A princess tires of a tour of European capitals and runs away from her entourage while in Rome. An American newspaper reporter takes her under his wing in the hope of getting an exclusive, but as he shows her the sights of the city, he starts to fall in love with her. Romantic comedy, starring Audrey Hepburn, Gregory Peck, Eddie Albert and Harcourt Williams.(n)

programme.title: Girls Lost
programme.desc: Three bullied teenage schoolgirls drink the nectar of a mysterious plant growing in one of their gardens and are turned into boys. Swedish fantasy drama, starring Mandus Berg, Adam Dahlgren and Malin Eriksson.(n)

programme.title: Zoom
programme.desc: The lives of an aspiring novelist, an artist and a film director collide in unexpected ways. Reality-bending comedy, starring Alison Pill, Gael Garcia Bernal and Mariana Ximenes.(n)

programme.title: Junction 48
programme.desc: An aspiring Palestinian rapper struggles to find his voice in the face of family tragedy and simmering Arab-Israeli tensions. Israeli drama, starring Tamer Nafar, Samar Qupty and Salwa Nakkara. In Arabic and Hebrew.(n)

programme.title: Norman
programme.desc: A small-time New York hustler glimpses the big time when he charms a visiting Israeli politician who goes on to become prime minister. Drama, starring Richard Gere, Lior Ashkenazi and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch.(n)

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: A white rapper strives to make a name for himself on the music scene, but his deprived home life on a Detroit trailer park and romantic complications put a damper on his plans as he struggles to win over the crowds and earn the respect of his peers. Drama, starring Eminem, Kim Basinger, Mekhi Phifer and Brittany Murphy.(n)

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: A British diplomat in Kenya takes charge of the investigation into the murder of his wife, who had published an article highly critical of the money-making collusion between the High Commission and a pharmaceutical manufacturer. Fernando Meirelles' political thriller, based on John le Carre's novel, with Ralph Fiennes, Rachel Weisz, Danny Huston and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After an African American photographer and his white girlfriend visit her wealthy parents, he suspects there's more to the locals than meets the eye. Psychological thriller, starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones.(n)

programme.title: An
programme.desc: A pancake stall manager is confronted with an odd but sympathetic elderly woman looking for work. Before long she changes his life. Drama, starring Kirin Kiki, Masatoshi Nagase and Kyara Uchida. In Japanese.(n)

programme.title: After the Storm
programme.desc: Following the death of his father, a private detective struggles to find child support money and reconnect with his son and ex-wife. Comedy drama, starring Hiroshi Abe, Yoko Maki and Satomi Kobayashi. In Japanese.(n)

programme.title: Heaven Knows What
programme.desc: A heroin addict roams the streets of New York trying to raise enough money to support her habit. She remains desperately devoted to her neglectful boyfriend, who drifts in and out of her life, and reaches a turning point in her life after he tries to persuade her to commit suicide. Drama, starring Arielle Holmes and Caleb Landry Jones.(n)

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger is hired to defend a remote frontier town from three outlaws who are making people's lives a misery. Although he rids the community of the troublemakers, the residents' lives take a turn for the worse as their saviour seizes control of the town and seeks to punish them for their past sins. Western, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Verna Bloom and Marianna Hill.(n)

programme.title: Tramontane
programme.desc: A blind Lebanese musician embarks on a journey of self-discovery when learns that his true heritage has been kept from him. Drama, starring Barakat Jabbour, Julia Kassar and Toufic Barakat. In Arabic.(n)

programme.title: Night Fare
programme.desc: When two old friends partying in Paris skip out on a taxi fare they wind up on the wrong side of a manhunt. Thriller, starring Jonathan Howard, Jonathan Demurger and Fanny Valette.(n)

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: A lonely photo technician develops an increasing obsession with a seemingly perfect couple and their child, whose pictures he processes - but when he uncovers evidence of marital infidelity, he resolves to expose the truth, regardless of the cost. Psychological thriller, starring Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole and Dylan Smith.(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: A fresh-faced Marine's boot-camp training turns into a real tour of duty when he is sent to fight in the Gulf War in 1991. However, the desert action is not what the new recruit expected - the willing soldiers are forced to wait for hours in searing heat, while their day is punctuated by moments of terror. Drama, based on the autobiography by veteran Anthony Swofford, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Jamie Foxx, Peter Sarsgaard and Chris Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Queen of Earth
programme.desc: Grieving after the death of her father, a troubled woman retreats to her best friend's lake house and spirals into despair. Psychological thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Katherine Waterston and Patrick Fugit.(n)

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Two teenagers from rival New York street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, fall in love - but it causes already simmering tensions to explode. Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim's Oscar-winning musical based on Romeo and Juliet, adapted from the stage play, starring Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno and George Chakiris.(n)

programme.title: Julieta
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a childhood friend of her estranged daughter causes a guilt-ridden Madrid woman to rethink her future. Pedro Almodovar drama, starring Emma Suarez and Adriana Ugarte.(n)

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: A habitual thief and his cop wife are distraught to discover they cannot have children, so set out to kidnap one of five babies born to a local tycoon. However, a relentless bounty hunter is soon on their trail, while two escaped convicts hope to get a reward for returning the child. Coen brothers comedy, starring Nicolas Cage, Holly Hunter, John Goodman and Frances McDormand.(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled
programme.desc: The arrival of a wounded Civil War soldier brings jealousy and betrayal to a Southern girls' school. Period drama, starring Colin Farrell, Nicole Kidman and Kirsten Dunst.(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.(n)

programme.title: Raw
programme.desc: After a trainee vet and strict vegetarian is pressured into eating meat for the first time, she develops a craving for flesh. Horror, starring Garance Marillier, Ella Rumpf and Rabah Nait Oufella. In French.(n)

programme.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: A Victorian scientist investigating the mysterious sinking of whaling ships in the Pacific falls overboard during an attack on his vessel. Along with a veteran mariner and a diver, he is picked up and taken captive by Captain Nemo and whisked away on a series of adventures in his futuristic submarine. Disney fantasy, based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas and Peter Lorre.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: A New York teenager moves with her parents to a small town, where she quickly gets drawn into a bitter conflict with a local girl - until auditions for a musical give her the chance to outshine her rival. Meanwhile, she faces the challenge of working out how to get back to the big city for her favourite band's farewell concert. Drama, starring Lindsay Lohan, Adam Garcia, Glenne Headly and Alison Pill.

programme.title: The Story of Robin Hood and His Merrie Men
programme.desc: A noble archer attends a royal contest, but on the way home his father is murdered by henchmen of the wicked King John. He assumes the life of an outlaw, gathering a band of followers in Sherwood Forest and fighting to bring justice to the over-taxed poor and avenge his father's death. Adventure, starring Richard Todd, Joan Rice and Peter Finch.

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: Nemo and dad Marlin set out on an underwater adventure to help their forgetful friend Dory find her parents. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks and Ed O'Neill.

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: Constantly outshined and outraced by a fleet of hi-tech rookies, former champ Lightning McQueen must find a new way to win. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson, Cristela Alonzo and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: A jealous string-pulled cowboy doll's status as his owner's favourite plaything is threatened by the arrival of a charismatic hi-tech astronaut figure, who refuses to believe he is simply a toy. However, the rivals are forced to work together when they are left stranded in the outside world. Pixar animated adventure, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles and Jim Varney.

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: Cowboy doll Woody is stolen by an unscrupulous toy collector, who knows he is worth a fortune as a collectible, prompting fearless Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear to lead a daring across-town mission to rescue him. However, Woody is tempted to spend his life languishing in the safety of a museum rather than face the prospect of his owner growing up. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Woody, Buzz and the other toys accidently end up in a daycare centre when their owner grows up. At first this seems like the perfect new home for them, but when they realise the dangers lurking under the surface, they begin to formulate an escape plan. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: Constantly outshined and outraced by a fleet of hi-tech rookies, former champ Lightning McQueen must find a new way to win. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson, Cristela Alonzo and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: Piper
programme.desc: Animated Pixar short, directed by Alan Barillaro. A mother bird tries to teach her little one how to find food for herself, but encounters a traumatic experience.

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: Nemo and dad Marlin set out on an underwater adventure to help their forgetful friend Dory find her parents. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks and Ed O'Neill.

programme.title: Jack-Jack Attack
programme.desc: Animated spin-off from The Incredibles, in which the family's baby son causes mayhem for his teenage babysitter when his superpowers start to manifest themselves. With the voices of Bret Parker and Jason Lee.

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill.

programme.title: Muppet Treasure Island
programme.desc: A youngster finds a treasure map and joins an expedition searching for a famous buccaneer's lost treasure on an unexplored island. However, their mission falls foul of a band of pirates hiding out among the crew. Musical comedy based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, starring Tim Curry, Billy Connolly, Jennifer Saunders and Kevin Bishop alongside the puppet characters.

programme.title: Tarzan II
programme.desc: Growing up in the jungle, the young Tarzan realises he is not quite the same as his simian siblings, and decides to run away. He soon comes across a group of gorillas who send him up a mysterious mountain, where a legendary monster awaits. Disney animated prequel, which goes back in time to the ape man's childhood, with the voices of Harrison Chad, Ron Perlman, Glenn Close and Lance Henriksen.(n)

programme.title: College Road Trip
programme.desc: Overprotective police chief James Porter insists on escorting his daughter Melanie on a road trip across America when she is invited for an interview at a prestigious college 800 miles from home - but the journey soon descends into chaos. Family comedy, starring Martin Lawrence, Raven-Symone and Brenda Song.(n)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill.(n)

programme.title: Brother Bear
programme.desc: A Native American boy plots revenge when his father is killed by a bear that was protecting its young. However, upon entering the forest he is magically transformed into a cub and soon learns a lesson about nature's relationship with man. Animated adventure, with the voices of Joaquin Phoenix, Rick Moranis and Dave Thomas.(n)

programme.title: Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: A downtrodden handyman is forced to look after his niece and nephew. He soon wins them over with his knack for telling exciting stories, but to their surprise the tall tales start coming true - and as the children make their own suggestions, the results become even more incredible. Fantasy comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Guy Pearce and Russell Brand.(n)

programme.title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
programme.desc: Anthology of animated tales based on AA Milne's stories, following a series of exploits of the dim-witted bear and his collection of unusual friends. With the voices of Sterling Holloway, Paul Winchell, Sebastian Cabot and Junius Matthews.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: A crop duster longs to be a racing plane, but is hamstrung by a fear of heights. With the aid of a veteran flyer, he learns to conquer his phobia and compete against some of the world's greatest flyers in a round-the-world race. Animated adventure spin-off from Pixar's Cars, with the voices of Dane Cook, Teri Hatcher and Stacy Keach.(n)

programme.title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
programme.desc: Anthology of animated tales based on AA Milne's stories, following a series of exploits of the dim-witted bear and his collection of unusual friends. With the voices of Sterling Holloway, Paul Winchell, Sebastian Cabot and Junius Matthews.(n)

With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Remember the Titans
programme.desc: At the end of high-school segregation in the early 1970s, a black teacher struggles to deal with pressures on and off the pitch as he faces his first season as coach of the now racially integrated American football team. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, Will Patton, Wood Harris, Ryan Hurst, Nicole Ari Parker and Donald Faison.(n)

programme.title: Disney's Blank Cheque
programme.desc: Convicted bank-robber Carl Quigley plots to exchange $1,000,000 in stolen bills by coercing a bank's president into swapping the notes for legal tender. As he tries to escape the scene of his plot, Quigley runs over 11-year-old Preston Waters' bicycle, and in his haste to get away, offers the boy a blank cheque as compensation. However, Quigley fails to anticipate tech-savvy Preston exploiting the gesture to help himself to the criminal's million-dollar fortune, then embarking a dream spending spree. Family comedy, starring Brian Bonsall and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.(n)

programme.title: Remember the Titans
programme.desc: At the end of high-school segregation in the early 1970s, a black teacher struggles to deal with pressures on and off the pitch as he faces his first season as coach of the now racially integrated American football team. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, Will Patton, Wood Harris, Ryan Hurst, Nicole Ari Parker and Donald Faison.(n)

Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.(n)

programme.title: Heavyweights
programme.desc: Shy, overweight kids look forward to their annual holiday together, an occasion which gives them the chance to really enjoy themselves. However, they are shocked to learn their summer camp has been taken over by a fanatical fitness trainer determined to knock them into shape by fair means or foul. Family comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Aaron Schwartz, Shaun Weiss and Tom Hodges.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.(n)

programme.title: Return to Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy is whisked back to Oz in a storm and discovers the evil Nome King has taken over the magical land and turned her old friends to stone. Teaming up with some strange new companions, she sets out to banish him and his monstrous comrades. Fantasy adventure, based on the novels by L Frank Baum, starring Fairuza Balk, Jean Marsh, Nicol Williamson and Piper Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Heavyweights
programme.desc: Shy, overweight kids look forward to their annual holiday together, an occasion which gives them the chance to really enjoy themselves. However, they are shocked to learn their summer camp has been taken over by a fanatical fitness trainer determined to knock them into shape by fair means or foul. Family comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Aaron Schwartz, Shaun Weiss and Tom Hodges.(n)

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.(n)

programme.desc: Dorothy is whisked back to Oz in a storm and discovers the evil Nome King has taken over the magical land and turned her old friends to stone. Teaming up with some strange new companions, she sets out to banish him and his monstrous comrades. Fantasy adventure, based on the novels by L Frank Baum, starring Fairuza Balk, Jean Marsh, Nicol Williamson and Piper Laurie.(n)

programme.title: The Great Muppet Caper
programme.desc: Reporters Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear are sacked for missing out on a massive scoop about the theft of jewellery from famous British fashion designer Lady Holiday. To try to re-establish their reputations, the duo and Gonzo fly to London to see if they can track down the culprit. Comedy, with the voices of Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with cameo appearances by John Cleese, Diana Rigg, Charles Grodin and Peter Ustinov.(n)

programme.title: Winter Wedding
programme.desc: A woman travels to small-town Vermont hoping to spend the perfect Christmas with her long-lost family, but an anonymous text threatens to derail everything. Romantic drama, starring Erin Krakow, Niall Matter and Wendie Malick.

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.

programme.title: Dive Olly Dive and the Octopus Rescue
programme.desc: Charley the octopus discovers that fame and fortune are overrated after inadvertently entering a star search. Undersea animated adventure, featuring the voices of Olivia Duke, Caitlyn Bairstow and Griffin Kingston.

programme.title: The Land Before Time
programme.desc: A young brontosaurus is left alone when his mother dies, so goes off in search of a legendary valley, where food is plentiful and he will be safe. He acquires a group of new friends on his journey, who help each other to avoid predators and obstacles in their way. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gabriel Damon and Pat Hingle.

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A directionless loser tries to prove himself to the woman he loves by volunteering for a travel writing assignment. He is sent to the Bermuda Triangle, where he ends up stranded on an island populated by miniature people to whom he is a giant. Fantasy comedy, starring Jack Black, Emily Blunt, Jason Segel and Billy Connolly.

programme.title: Thumbelina
programme.desc: A girl the size of her mother's thumb leads a lonely life, until she falls in love with the similarly tiny prince of the fairies. However, their romance is cut short when she is kidnapped by a family of toads and faces a perilous journey through a forest to return home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Gary Imhoff and John Hurt.

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: The lost princess from the executed Russian royal family returns to her St Petersburg home with no memory of her heritage. As she tries to retrace her hidden past, two conmen use her in a cunning money-making scheme, little realising the momentous events their duplicity is about to set in motion. Animated adventure, with the voices of Meg Ryan, John Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A directionless loser tries to prove himself to the woman he loves by volunteering for a travel writing assignment. He is sent to the Bermuda Triangle, where he ends up stranded on an island populated by miniature people to whom he is a giant. Fantasy comedy, starring Jack Black, Emily Blunt, Jason Segel and Billy Connolly.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the children's books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman.

programme.title: Goal! The Dream Begins
programme.desc: A Mexican living in Los Angeles dreams of becoming a professional footballer - and his wish seems to come true when a talent scout offers him the chance to play for Newcastle United. Unfortunately, the pressures of the Premier League and adapting to a new life in Britain prove harder than expected. Drama, starring Kuno Becker and Anna Friel. David Beckham, Alan Shearer and Zinedine Zidane make cameo appearances.

programme.title: Space Jam
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth to abduct the Looney Tunes gang as a new attraction at their failing intergalactic theme park. To keep their freedom, Bugs Bunny and friends challenge the invaders to a high-stakes basketball game, calling on Michael Jordan to save the day and send the extraterrestrials back where they came from. Live action and animated comedy, starring Bill Murray and Danny DeVito, with the voices of Billy West and Bill Farmer.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: The lost princess from the executed Russian royal family returns to her St Petersburg home with no memory of her heritage. As she tries to retrace her hidden past, two conmen use her in a cunning money-making scheme, little realising the momentous events their duplicity is about to set in motion. Animated adventure, with the voices of Meg Ryan, John Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Mune: Guardian Of The Moon
programme.desc: Young forest faun Mune embarks on an epic quest to reclaim the sun from the villainous ruler of the underworld. Fantasy animation, featuring the voices of Omar Sy, Izia Higelin and Michael Gregorio.(n)

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of children's books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to the magical world accompanied by their selfish cousin. They join their old friend King Caspian as he sets sail across the sea in search of seven of his father's allies who had been banished years before, but along the way they discover an evil force is growing in strength. Fantasy adventure, with Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, Will Poulter and Ben Barnes.(n)

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Creepy couple Morticia and Gomez find their unconventional life threatened by a man claiming to be a long-lost relative. When they welcome him with open arms, they fall prey to a plot that could cost them their ancestral home and the family fortune. Black comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci, Jimmy Workman and Carel Struycken.(n)

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Derek's anniversary celebrations are thwarted by an evil sorcerer searching for a magical orb hidden deep inside their castle. When Derek is lured out of the palace to rescue his kidnapped mother, Odette calls on her band of animal friends for help. Animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Douglas Sills, Jake Williamson and Christy Landers.(n)

programme.title: Louis & Luca - The Big Cheese Race
programme.desc: A friendly cheese race becomes a high-stakes dash to the finish after magpie Louis risks his friend's workshop with a secret bet. Animation, with the voices of John F Brungot, Anders Bye and Frimand Plosen.(n)
