programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Shooter puts together a big anti-violence rally to honor his late son. Dime's baby shower takes a turn when Stevie and Sean Garrett argue. Stevie enlists Rich Dollaz to get back at Erica. Tommie reconnects with the group (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Ryan starts a new shop but faces a learning curve when bringing in a new staff. Lily hires a new artist, which does not fly with Charmaine, who brought Dani back to the shop. Nikki throws Phor a surprise party that shows how much Chi-town loves him. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Shawn figures he's movin' on up when he lands a job at the ad agency in the building---until his boss Ted takes credit for his slogan. Meanwhile, Marlon is left to run the newsstand. Ted: Jack Plotnick. Pops: John Witherspoon. Erik Estrada has a cameo. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: The brothers suspect Pops is having an affair when he starts dressing up in fine clothes and staying out late. Anna Maria Horsford, Shawn Wayans, Marlon Wayans. Carmella: Iona Morris. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Marlon's forced to propose to his girlfriend (Melissa De Sousa) when her brother, a neighborhood bully, learns how close they've become. Shank: Bernie Mac. Pops: John Witherspoon. Shawn: Shawn Wayans. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: When a woman gives birth in the diner, it pushes Dee's maternal pangs into overdrive, sending her on a search for a dad. Dee: Anna Marie Horsford. Tracy: Kebe Dunn. Pops: John Witherspoon. Dupree: Jermaine Hopkins. Shawn: Shawn Wayans. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Martin
programme.desc: Gina and Pam put their best feet forward to be accepted into an exclusive women's club. Amanda: Ann Weldon. Marian: Roxanne Reese. Mrs. Whitmore: Ethel Ayler. Gina: Tisha Campbell. Pam: Tichina Arnold. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Martin
programme.sub-title: Nuttin' Goin' On but the Rent
programme.desc: Frosty relations with his landlord prompt Martin to refuse to pay the rent---which leads the landlord to cut off the heat. Martin Lawrence. Hustle Man: Tracy Morgan. Cole: Carl Anthony Payne II. Gina: Tisha Campbell. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Martin
programme.desc: Martin and Gina go to dinner with their former love interests to prove there are no sparks left. Derrick: Joseph C. Phillips. Tanya: Angelle Brooks. Patrice: Vivica Fox. Carla: Dominique Jennings. Gina: Tisha Campbell. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Martin
programme.desc: To save a movie theater, Martin holds a benefit featuring black TV and movie actors from the 1970s. Cameos include Pam Grier, Ja'net DuBois, Dick Anthony Williams and Whitman Mayo. Martin Lawrence. Gina: Tisha Campbell. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Philip and Vivian welcome a '60s radical, who arouses the FBI's interest and influences Will and Carlton to take action over the firing of a nonconformist teacher (Kenneth Tigar). Agent Collins: Tim Russ. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will is reluctant to share his mother when she visits with her new man and his daughter. Vy: Vernee Watson-Johnson. Will: Will Smith. Vivian: Janet Hubert-Whitten. Philip: James Avery. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Aunt Helen arrives unexpectedly, and throws Will and Carlton's plans for romance into limbo. Lester: Felton Perry. Monique: Kent Masters-King. Renee: Monique Mannen. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Ashley cringes when the family oohs and aahs over her relationship with Kevin (Marc Robinson), but Will chokes when she asks him about sex. Ms. Rinkoff: B.J. Jefferson. Will: Will Smith. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop: Miami
programme.desc: In the series premiere, Trick Daddy and Trina reunite for a long-awaited album; Amara La Negra has big dreams of crossing over into the American music market; and Gunplay is back in Miami, ready to face demons from his past. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop: Miami
programme.desc: Pleasure P and Shay try to pick up the pieces of their relationship. Trick's estranged wife comes looking for closure. Gunplay reconnects with an old flame. Veronica Vega and Steph Lecor seek out Young Hollywood. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop: Miami
programme.desc: Veronica brings a surprise guest to meet with Amara. Prince's nightlife takeover hits a snag. Jojo deals with family turmoil. Bobby and Jeffrey work on their relationship. An old friend pops up on Pleasure P. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop: Miami
programme.desc: Jeffrey and Malik take their affair to the next level; Amara confronts Veronica Vega over her association with Young Hollywood; Jojo switches teams; Keyara gets payback on Gunplay; and Liz and Prince fall out. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop: Miami
programme.desc: Amara claps back at her haters. Prince seeks revenge. Pleasure P faces the music with Gabby and Shay. Malik takes the next step in his relationship with Jeffrey, but an unexpected pop-up derails his plans. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop: Miami
programme.desc: Bobby and Malik vie for Jeffrey's love. Veronica airs out her grievances with Jojo. Trina gets in the middle of Joy and Trick Daddy's divorce, and a sudden loss leads Gunplay into a downward spiral. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop: Miami
programme.desc: Amara receives career help from an unlikely source. Shay discovers Scrappy's extracurricular activities. Gunplay struggles to overcome his demons. Trick Daddy celebrates a marriage that isn't over. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Finished with their business in Houston, the crew heads to the dude ranch. Rasheeda hopes everyone can put their drama to the side to enjoy the trip, but Spice and Tokyo quickly get back into it. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)

programme.title: Bitz & Bob: You Can Do It Too

programme.desc: Maddie explores some favourite foods. She uses a special slow motion camera to find out why popcorn pops. An animation shows what popcorn is made of and how a water droplet hidden inside each kernel of corn expands as it is cooked, making it pop. Next, Maddie visits a pasta factory to see how flour is mixed with water and turned into pasta dough and how special cutters are used to create different pasta shapes.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: In this episode Alexa visits her grandparents who, for a special treat, take her sailing! Alexa soon learns about the boat and becomes 'Captain Alexa'. Later, back at Grandpa and Grandma Val's house, there is a tasty family barbeque, but will Alexa, Dad and little brother Archie finish their bug hunt in time to eat?

programme.title: Swashbuckle
programme.desc: Kenny, Ifeoma and Lewis are the three Swashbucklers tackling big physical games to win back Gem's jewels! Cook and Line are writing a letter back home and encourage Captain Sinker to do the same, so she explains her tricky family history in a song!

programme.title: My Pet and Me
programme.desc: Ferne visits Harry and his pet degus. Harry knows a lot about his pets and together they clean out the cage and give them fresh sticks to knaw on. They watch the degus enjoying a sand bath in their cage and decide to create a beach in Harry's living room just for the Degus to enjoy.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: The presenter goes back in time to collect a fern for the museum, and meets a large Diplodocus dinosaur.

programme.title: Little Roy
programme.desc: Roy, Becky and Tristan are minding Mrs Barker's stall at the local fair. When Roy spots an old teapot, he accidentally gets his head stuck in it! Stacy is running the stall next to them. She seems nice initially, but when Mrs Barker goes, she intentionally loses them a sale. Tristan, Becky and Roy have an idea to get back at her. Roy pops into the teapot and they put it on the table. After asking Stacy to mind the stall, Becky and Tristan hide to see what will happen. Stacy is fooled by Genie Roy's act! Roy suggests if she helps someone, she will get her wish. Seeing Bill losing at the ping pong toss, Stacy rushes over to give him advice. While she's gone, Mrs Barker reveals Stacy is trying to make money to buy a new television for her granny! Roy, Becky and Tristan feel terrible! What would Wonder Roy do?

programme.title: Little Roy
programme.desc: Becky and Roy cannot stand still and behave themselves for the family photo.

programme.title: Where in the World
programme.sub-title: Mario, Tyra and Liza: Tyra Builds Sandcastles at the Beach
programme.desc: In Italy, Mario, who's seven, spends Saturday cleaning prawns ready for customers at his dad's fish shop. On a hot day in Ghana, five-year-old Tyra cools off at the beach, and builds a massive sandcastle. And in Russia, seven-year-old Liza and her twin brother, Styopa, build a giant plastic tower, only to see it knocked down by their little sister Yulia. We see that although children live in different countries, may look different and speak different languages, the joys and challenges of childhood are universal.
